org.hibernate.property

Interface Setter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BackrefPropertyAccessor.BackrefSetter, BasicPropertyAccessor.BasicSetter, DirectPropertyAccessor.DirectSetter, EmbeddedPropertyAccessor.EmbeddedSetter, IndexPropertyAccessor.IndexSetter, MapAccessor.MapSetter

    public interface Setter
extends Serializable
    Sets values to a particular property.

       Object value,
       SessionFactoryImplementor factory)
         throws HibernateException
        Set the property value from the given instance
        Parameters:

        value - The value to be set on the target.
        factory - The session factory from which this request originated.
